meanings.sent1: The phylaxises in the forest protected the animals from harm.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended multiple phylaxises to prevent allergic reactions.
meanings.sent3: The phylaxises at the museum were like guardians of the ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent4: The phylaxises of the immune system stood ready to defend against invaders.
meanings.sent5: The colorful phylaxises of the reef danced gracefully in the water.

meanings.definition: Phylaxises: third person singular form of phylaxis
meanings.sent1: She phylaxises by taking her medication every day.
meanings.sent2: He phylaxises against viruses by washing his hands regularly.
meanings.sent3: The cat phylaxises by grooming itself meticulously.
meanings.sent4: The soldier phylaxises his comrades by keeping watch through the night.
meanings.sent5: The plant phylaxises by closing its petals at night to protect its nectar.
